product_name: Elemental Herbs All Good Original Lip Balm - SPF 20
long_description: Soothe dry lips and protect them from exposure with the Elemental Herbs All Good Original Lip Balm. Active ingredient zinc oxide provides SPF 20 protection from UVA and UVB rays. Elemental Herbs All Good Original Lip Balm moisturizes lips with 90% organic ingredients.
short_description: Soothe dry lips and protect them from exposure with the Elemental Herbs All Good Original Lip Balm.
